Translations.Text: ni:Sanka ame tamari tarapha satya sathe potani kitaba avatarita kari, jethi tame lokomam te vastu vise n'yaya karo, jena vise allaha ta'ala'e tamane sikhavadyum che ane apramanika lokona madada karanara na bano
ane allaha ta'ala pase maphi mango, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala mapha karanara, krpa karanara che
ane te loko taraphathi jhaghado na karo je'o potana vise ja apramanikata dakhave che, ni:Sanka apramanika, papine allaha ta'ala pasanda karato nathi

Te lokothi chupa'i jaya che (parantu) allaha ta'alathi chupa'i sakata nathi, te ratrina samaye jyare ke allaha ni anicchaniya vato vise salahasucana kare che, te samaye pana allaha te'oni sathe hoya che, te'ona dareka karyone tene gheravavamam rakhela che
ham to tame ja cho te loko, jemane duniyamam te'oni madada kari, parantu allaha ta'ala samaksa kayamatana divase te'oni madada kona karase? Ane te kona che je te'ono vakila bani ubho rahese
je vyakti ko'i kharaba krtya kare athava potana jiva para atyacara kare pachi allaha ta'alathi maphi mange to te allahane mapha karanara, dayalu pamase
ane je guno kare che teno bhara tena para ja che ane allaha khuba sari rite jananara ane pure-puro hikamatavalo che
ane je vyakti ko'i papa athava bhula kari ko'i nirdosana mathe aksepa muke to tene khuba ja moto aropa lagavyo ane khullum papa karyu
